Quotations.ab: bahr ī ābān nē rōšnag [ast] *kē gōwēd ay az aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaoθrąm haomauuaitīm gaomauuaitīm haδānaēpatauuaitīm tā tauua ahurāne ahurahe ... vahištābiiāō zaoθrābiiō ast kē tauua ahurāne ēd-iz gōwēd

The (extension of the) section of the waters is not clear. There is one who says: From aṣ̌aiia daδąmi imąm zaoθrąm haomauuaitīm gaomauuaitīm haδānaēpatauuaitīm (Y66.1) to tauua ahurahe (Y68.1) and vahištābiiāō zaoθrābiiō (Y68.10). There is one commentator who says: "Until tauua ahurāne (Y68.1 or Y68.15)".

Commentary.ab: Acording to (Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: p.111) tauua ahurāne refers to Y66.19 [Y66.17 according to Geldner, but they indicate Y66.16] and they deduce that "the section is limited to the recitation of Y66.". However, the litany can impossibly end in Y66. The šnūman, the mention of the frauuaṣ̌is and the final stanza would be missing. It must refer to Y68.1 or Y68.15.
